name: Why MVC is so important
description: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for Data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

name: The Ultimate Tech Quiz
description: A web app that will give users 10 new technical questions each day and track their progress in things like programming, cybersecurity, database architecture, and more!

name: CodeWars
description: A platform to challenge and build on your coding skills.
